item.title: Ubuntu安装zabbix
item.author: WAKE
item.description: 1、安装6.4版本zabbix，以 Ubuntu 22.04、MySql、Nginx为例 1 2 3 4 wget https://repo.zabbix.com/zabbix/6.4/ubuntu/pool/main/z/zabbix-release/zabbix-release_6.4-1+ubuntu22.04_all.deb sudo dpkg -i zabbix-release_6.4-1+ubuntu22.04_all.deb sudo apt update sudo apt install zabbix-server-mysql zabbix-frontend-php zabbix-nginx-conf zabbix-sql-scripts zabbix-agent 2 、安装MySql 下载h
